messages: Oh hi.  I heard there was a new skeleton in town and I had come see what the commotion is about.  Takiyasha is quite popular.
Great job our there!  I heard that you were able to steal a few coins from the villagers.  Make sure to trade them to Melquiades for weapons!
Keep it up.  I heard that the cleric villagers are tasked with building the pedestals, so try and target those guys first.
Looks like you're still alive.  Rumor has it that after the third full night, the villagers send their leader to banish you once and for all.
Good luck out there, you will need it.
